mapper.select: SELECT project_no, member_no, category_id, project_title, project_intro, project_price, open_date, close_date, delivery_date, project_content, fund_price, project_step FROM project WHERE project_no = #{projectNo}
SELECT news_no, news_title, news_date,project_no FROM project_news WHERE project_no = #{projectNo} ORDER BY news_no DESC
SELECT comment_no, comment_content, comment_writer, comment_date,project_no FROM project_comment WHERE project_no = #{projectNo} ORDER BY comment_no DESC
SELECT project_content FROM project WHERE project_no = #{projectNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO project_news(news_no,project_no, news_title, news_content) VALUES (news_seq.nextval, #{projectNo}, #{newsTitle}, #{newsContent})
